body.name: Lalord Pour Over Coffee Maker, 20 oz Borosilicate Glass Carafe with 100 pcs V60 Paper Filter, Walnut Handle & Glass Lid, Drip Coffee Maker for Home Café Restaurant Camping, 600 ml, Clear
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 33 mins
features: 【Safe Material】Both the dripper and the coffee pot are made of borosilicate glass, which is odor-free, BPA-free, not easy to residue, and easy to clean. The filter paper is made from natural wood pulp without any bleaching.
【Large Capacity】The capacity of the coffee pot is 20 ounces/600 milliliters, which is very suitable for 1-3 people. The included lid makes it easy to keep coffee cold in the refrigerator.

【100 Sheets of Paper Filter】Equipped with 100 sheets of disposable filter paper, which is made of pure wood pulp, no odor, unbleached, and does not contain any chemicals. The type of filter paper is conical V60/V02 filter paper, which is very convenient to replenish after 100 pieces of filter paper are used up.

【Borosilicate Glass Dripper with Walnut Handle】This dripper can be applied to most containers, including our commonly used mug or glasses cup. We have this pour over coffee dripper sold separately. It is the perfect choice for pour over coffee lovers.

【A Gift for Coffee Lovers】The coffee grounds used in the video and pictures we show are too coarse, and this set is suitable for use with medium ground coffee. The temperature of the water is suitable for 185℉-203℉, and according to the ratio that suits your taste, the brewed coffee tastes wonderful！

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1. Ground coffee beans: medium ground coffee 2. Boil hot water: Golden ratio: about 1:10 to 1:16 (coffee powder: water). Water temperature: 185℉-203℉ 3. Preheating: Wet the filter paper with hot water until completely soaked. Pour out the hot water in the lower pot after preheating. 4. Water injection and steaming: Inject hot water until the coffee grounds are completely soaked. Wait for about 20 to 40 seconds, and continue injecting water until the gas in the coffee powder is completely released. 5. Remove the filter & Enjoy your coffee

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was a little smaller than I imagined it would be but it hold enough coffee to fill my large travel mug and still pour my husband a large mug of coffee. It’s easy to use and comes with everything you need to get started except the coffee & hot water! It is easy to clean and shockingly keeps your coffee warm for some time if you use the stopper provided.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful design & great product
reviews.reviewText: It looks luxurious and easily makes enough coffee for both me and my husband. love the design and ease of use. would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars First came in broken but was quickly replaced
reviews.reviewText: I love the coffee made in this coffee maker. I just wish I could put it in the microwave but the handle gets to hot. I would have given it a 5 but does not seem to be microwave safe for reheating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Using a typical plastic coffee maker never sat well with me, always felt like I was making coffee with dirty water, and I have looked everywhere for a glass percolator. They were very popular uin the 70 but they are rare now and cost a fortune. This was the solution. Also the added bonus of taking the time to heat the water, and set it up, and pour is like a moment often, a ritual that really helps start my morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Contento, hace su trabajo. Más que una tapa hace falta es una base para colocar el dripper al momento de servir. Le he dado unos golpecitos sin querer y ha resistido. Sigue de pie.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. really beautiful, works very well and is easy to clean :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Pour Over Carafe, A little on the thin side
reviews.reviewText: Lalord Pour Over Coffee Maker is a wonderful addition to my coffee bar. There is just nothing quite like a good pour over coffee (and a double pour over for that matter). On the back of the box, it will tell you everything you need to do in order to make the perfect pour over coffee and it is literally quite fantastic at it.Inside of the box you will find the Glass Carafe, 100 V60 Paper Filters and a Glass Lid for doing the actual pour over. All of it looks really quite nice and is quite functional. The only area I dinged this (and really it's a 4.5 out of 5 for me but I cannot reflect that), is that the glass is actually extremely thin (huge plus for it being borosilicate glass but a large negative for the overall thickness). The problem with borosilicate glass when it is this thin is that it can be brittle (funny enough, it's also known for it's strength even when being thin), My point really is that something like this with parts that need to be interacted with really ought to be thicker for extra durability as I can easily see one wrong move and shattering the glass.For the price point, I certainly see a very great value here and would recommend it, just make sure to treat it with care knowing that it's extremely fragile and that it will likely not survive a drop.

This is my first ever pour over brewer and today was my first time trying it. Real newbie here.The first thing I thought when I opened it yesterday afternoon was how beautiful it was. I find it looks even prettier in person than it does online. And such a nice size.Today I got to use it for the first time, and despite some fumbling around trying to learn to make pour over coffee for the first time, I STILL managed to make myself the best cup of coffee I have ever had. This is the only way I ever want to make coffee again.All the elements of the coffee just came together perfectly. Honestly, I made it a bit strong and usually I hate strong coffee as it tastes bitter to me. But when I had another sip, I realized it was just so perfectly blended that I wouldn't have changed a thing.I'm in love with this system.I also love how you can put the filter in the carafe's top to drain when not using the top, I was happy to get a filter holder that was glass as I felt sure that would not impart any taste to the final coffee. And the wood adds such a beautiful accent. Just looking forward to using it for years to come.

Die Kanne mit 600 ml Fassungsvermögen macht einen guten Eindruck. Handling seh gut.Tropfer aus Borosilikatglas mit Walnussgriff.Als ich bestellt habe stand letztet Artikel für 24,99 € zugeschlagen. Heute,ein Tag danach verlangt man 33,99 €.Ganz schön dreist.Nachtrag: die Öffnung 3 cm ist zu groß,Kaffewasser läuft zu schnell durch.Besser wäre ein Edelstahlfilter oder ein Schieber mit dem ich die Verweildauer des durchtränkten Kaffeemehls bestimmen kann.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: How is this not more popular than the plastic V60?
reviews.reviewText: Genuine question, I don't like using plastic to brew coffee so thought I'd give this one a shot and I've loved using it every day since.Proper glass, lovely wood finish on the bottom of the filter, fits perfectly on top of the carafe. Came with everything as described - the carafe lid and filter paper. Everything fits well, no chemical taste on the paper.Brews perfectly and is able to he heated gently on a stove to keep it warm. I brew with this every day and it's flawless.
Per chi piace il caffè filtro, americano o lungo dir si voglia.... estetica super carina, molto pratica da usare e lavare. Volendo si può usare anche come teiera. Ottima come idea regalo.
This coffee maker has the perfect size for me. The quality is very good. I used it for 3-4 times already. It is easy to clean and I think I will try it as a tea pot next time. I am happy to have it.
